data.message: The european ruling class organizations like the C.I.A F.I.B and local law enforcement do mission's like locking up killer's, raper's, and kidnapper's for one because these criminal act's maybe taking place among there european population and also to win support among the African population and other non european population's to act as a propaganda tool to cover there terrorist acttack's targeting our African population and non european population's Nation wide and to wage counterinsurgency on a political level, economical level, and military level operation's targeting African revolutionary leadership and organizations and the masses of Africans and non europeans and low level europeans that go against the european ruling class in some form..... the european ruling class Organizations like the air force, navy, and army, and military, act as the worlds law enforcement to act as protection of stolen land and it's natural resources and human resources to be used in the interest of the european ruling class the european and not white families that got rich and powerful off of 400 years and counting of slavery, mass killing , mass rape, genocide,colonialism, imperialism, neo-colonialism european power in a African face, and capitalism were the european ruling class control the wealth of nations and power from terrorist acttack's of slavery, mass killing , mass rape, genocide,colonialism, imperialism, neo-colonialism european power in a African face, and capitalism were the european ruling class the european and not so called white families control the wealth of nations and power of the world until that critical mass of Africans form logical alliances and wage war on a political level, economical level, and military level combined in logical alliances with non europeans nation wide and world wide for a united Africa where the African masses have the political power, economical power , and military power in the interest of the African masses and control of Africa's natural resources and human resource used in the interest of the African masses at home Black Africa and world wide and world liberation seeing how europeans are a minority on the world stage and we as a African people are one of the majority's on the world stage it's not illogical for one to reason this it's either that or we get wiped out only time will tell how this crazy situation play's out . Anthony X
